name: Catgirl Pool Party
description:
Catgirl Pool Party is a 2d sidescrolling platformer originally indended to be developed using SGDK for the Sega Mega Drive. The game is fully free but requires either a Mega Drive / Genesis emulator or a compatible console for the Mega Drive demo. Work on the Mega Drive / Genesis version is suspended, but development on it could still be continued later. Note that since its free its fine to use an emulator to play it.

Right now the game is still work in progress so the demo doesn't have that much in it yet, but it will be more playable as time goes on.

On the Mega Drive demo;
---------------------------------------------------------
The options menu has customizable controls settings which can also be tested.
Any action button works for opening menus or starting the game.
Use start button to return to the titlescreen.

The catgirl can walk or use Aim action button to focus on aim.
Super soaker shooting kind of works. It also has curved slopes.

Added scrolling and fixed the camera view frame. The bunnygirl blows
bubbles from near the palm tree.
---------------------------------------------------------
PC version is being worked on but isn't available yet.
